subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire appears nude on the cover of ESPN Magazine, and that seems to be what the Knicks can expect from their new franchise star: bold gestures, a big personality and very little modesty.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire appears nude on the cover of ESPN Magazine, and that seems to be what the Knicks can expect from their new franchise star: bold gestures, a big personality and very little modesty.
